tool_description:
Welcome to the GSMarena API! Our API allows you to easily access and consume the vast array of data available on the GSMarena website. 

With our API, you can access detailed information about any phone or tablet, including technical specifications, images, and more. 

With the GSMarena API, you can quickly and easily: 
• Retrieve detailed information about any phone or tablet 
• Access images of any device 
• Get full specifications and features of any device 
• Check prices, ratings, and re...
title: CellPhones

api_list.name: GetPhonesByBrandId
api_list.description: Use this end point to load all phone ids for a specific brand. get the brand id from the endpoint GetBrands

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the phones from brand ID 237?
What phones are available under brand ID 100?
List all the phones for brand ID 50.
Could you retrieve the phones for brand ID 300?
Show me the phones associated with brand ID 150.
What are the phone IDs for brand ID 200?
Can you get me the list of phones for brand ID 75?
Retrieve all phones under brand ID 400.
What phones are listed under brand ID 25?
Show me the phones for brand ID 500.

api_list.name: GetBrands
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cellphones.p.rapidapi.com/phones/getbrands"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cellphones.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the cell phone brands available?
What are the different brands of cell phones?
Show me all the brands of mobile phones.

Please retrieve all the brands of cell phones.
Give me a list of all the mobile phone brands.
What brands of cell phones are there?
Can you display all the brands of smartphones?
List all the brands of cell phones, please.

api_list.name: GetPhoneDetails
api_list.description: Get all phone specifications & photos by phone id, get the phone id from the endpoint GetPhonesByBrandId
